page.title: 04A Farm Worker's Typical Day.
page.content: I decided to be a{farmer}because I enjoy the outdoor life. Although I like my job the hours are long. Work starts at 5.00am and usually finishes at 5.00pm but in the summer I may help with the{hay-making}in the evenings. I travel to various farms in a land- rover and carry out{general farmwork. My daily jobs consist of two hours {milking}which I do when I have brought in the cows. The milk tank has to be washed out ready for milking. After taking an hour for breakfast at seven o'clock I continue with jobs such as cleaning calf boxes, haying, watering calves, checking stocks in far fields and preparing for other feeds. From about 12.30pm to 1.30pm I go home for lunch. I then prepare for the afternoon milking. There will be other jobs to do before going home.
